Articles.Content: I did it. My first Mun orbiter. My ship was bingo fuel. Bob heroically EVA'd and used EVA propellant to slow himself enough down to go into first an elliptical orbit and then a more circular 1. While trying this he lowered his altitude a little to much and crashed into a Munar mountain. May he rest in peace.
Good work mate, so many kerbals to kill, so little time.
